title: Painless Performance 50003 Pro Street Chassis Harness with Switch Panel, 21-Circuits
features: 21-circuit harness and 8-switch roll bar mount switch panel; 12 Fuses w/Horn Relay
Switch panel is pre-labeled for the following: Start, Ignition, Electric Fan, Fuel Pump #1, Fuel Pump #2/Accessory, Water Pump, Lights, Accessory
Includes Painless mounting plate, firewall grommets, terminal assortment kit and the necessary connectors for turn signal switch, headlights, and alternator
Wiring is pre-terminated at the fuse block for easy installation; Each wire is custom printed with the circuit identification as well as using GM color codes for easy installation
Includes optional connector for use with a GM column mounted ignition switch
description: If you are looking for a switch panel and harness to keep your racecar streetable, this 21-circuit harness and switch panel combo is for you. As with all of our chassis harnesses this kit has all the wires labeled and is pre terminated at the fuse block for easy installation. This harness includes an optional connector if you want to use a GM column mounted ignition switch. The included switch panel is a roll bar mount 8-switch rocker panel. This panel is prewired and is a direct plug and play into this harness. Also Included is a painless mounting plate, grommets, terminal assortment kit, and the necessary connectors for your turn signal switch, headlights, and alternator. Each wire is custom printed with the circuit identification as well as using GM color codes for easy installation.
